scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.coverage:unit: npm run setupTestDb && ENV=test istanbul  --include-all-sources cover _mocha --dir unit -x 'coverage/**' -x '**/lcov-report/**' -x 'scripts/' -- ./server/tests/unit/index.js
scripts.coverage:integration: npm run setupTestDb && ENV=test istanbul  --include-all-sources cover _mocha --dir integration -x 'coverage/**' -x '**/lcov-report/**' -x 'scripts/' -- ./server/tests/integration/index.js
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:integration && istanbul report
scripts.codecov:unit: npm run setupTestDb && ENV=test istanbul  --include-all-sources cover _mocha --report lcovonly --dir unit -x 'codecov/**' -x '**/lcov-report/**' -x 'scripts/' -- ./server/tests/unit/index.js
scripts.codecov:integration: npm run setupTestDb && ENV=test istanbul  --include-all-sources cover _mocha --report lcovonly --dir integration -x 'coverage/**' -x '**/lcov-report/**' -x 'scripts/' -- ./server/tests/integration/index.js
scripts.codecov: npm run codecov:unit && npm run codecov:integration && istanbul report && codecov
